Wallen  (a mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị 27 n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1985 na Harare, Zimbabwe) bụ onye mba Zimbabwe na-ese ihe, nke a maara maka ọrụ na-enyocha omume mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya site na iji ihe osise anụ ụlọ
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na mba Australia, Germany, Netherlands, South Africa, Spain na United States.
2005–2007, National Gallery of Zimbabwe Visual Arts Studios, bụbu B.A.T.
